last_episode_to_air.name: Born in the Valley, Hollywood Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview: Brody performs at two of the year's biggest comedy festivals and throws himself a rooftop birthday party to celebrate all that he's accomplished.

name: Brody Stevens: Enjoy It!
overview: Comedian Steven Brody Stevens, known for his manic nature on stage, suffers a real public breakdown and attempts to put his life back together afterwards.

episodes.name: Brody Stevens, Who Are You?
episodes.overview: Brody enlists his friends to explain what makes his comedy unique, and he tries to reconcile with his estranged sister before their mother's 80th birthday party.

episodes.name: Breakdown!
episodes.overview: Brody stops taking his meds cold turkey, which leads to a manic episode that lands him in the UCLA psych ward.

episodes.name: I'm Sorry, Chelsea
episodes.overview: Brody decides to apologize to Chelsea Handler for the way he behaved when he worked as the warm-up act for "Chelsea Lately."

episodes.name: Oklahoma Cupid
episodes.overview: After years of being single, Brody decides to try Internet dating, and he enlists the help of his mother to create an OkCupid profile.

episodes.name: Nose Business Like Show Business
episodes.overview: Brody decides to take his acting career to the next level, so he invests in new headshots and some improv classes.

episodes.name: Conan!
episodes.overview: After an eight-year hiatus, Brody performs stand-up on television again.

episodes.name: What Nose Up... Must Come Down
episodes.overview: As Brody adjusts to his new medication, he falls into a deep depression that he fears will be with him for the rest of his life.

episodes.name: Face Time
episodes.overview: Brody tries hypnotherapy to help him get over his facial dysmorphia, and he hires a matchmaker to help with his dating issues.

episodes.name: Smoke and Believe
episodes.overview: Tension mounts between Brody and his crew over their fear that his frequent pot use will lead to another manic episode.

episodes.name: Jews and Samoans Rule Seattle
episodes.overview: Brody and his old partner Teina Manu stage a live reunion show of their beloved cable access program.

episodes.name: Boston Me Party
episodes.overview: Brody travels to Boston to shoot his episode of The Half Hour and interview the other 16 comedians being featured on the show for a behind-the-scenes web series.

episodes.name: Born in the Valley, Hollywood Finale
episodes.overview: Brody performs at two of the year's biggest comedy festivals and throws himself a rooftop birthday party to celebrate all that he's accomplished.
